text: Islamic Reconciliation Party or Al-Wefaq Islamic Party (, ) formerly named Reconciliation Committee (; Lejnat Al-Wefaq), was an Iranian local ethnic party associated with Arab minority in Khuzestan Province. The party had candidates shared with the Islamic Iran Participation Front, and was described as its Arabic wing. It won several seats in Ahvaz's City Council, as well as a seat in the Iranian Parliament. == Dissolution == On 4 November 2006, the Judicial system of Iran banned the party and declared it illegal on charges of "instigating unrest" and "opposing the system", accusing it of fueling 2005 Ahvaz unrest.
